string_to_speak: Welcome to the CSR Learn App. Press 1 for learning keyboard. Press 2 for Addition, 3 for subtraction, 4 for multiplication, 5 for division, 6 for custom exercises

hashmap.string: Congrats, you selected to learn addition
Congrats, you selected to learn subtraction
